source:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Mhon Mon is being plagued by hellish beasts and an empty stomach.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
ガリク村のモーンモンは、冒険者に魔物を倒してほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_TODO_00<tab>Lie in wait for the wandering weapon.
target: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAC5201 /var>で待機して<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2231101 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_000<tab>Oooh! What to do? What to do?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_000これはこれは腕の立ちそうな旅人さんネ！
ぜひアナタの力を貸してヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_001<tab>I want to make traditional Mord stew and I only need one more ingredient─Amber weed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_001私、モルド族の伝統料理に欠かせない香草、
「アンバーウィード」がほしいネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_002<tab>But it has become scarce around here, except for in an area that is plagued by evil weapons!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_002でも、「アンバーウィード」の群生地は、
「イビルウェポン」という魔物が現れるネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_003<tab>Funny name, not so funny when they are trying to kill you, though! There is an especially horrible one called the wandering weapon who the others seem to follow.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_003特に最近は、とりわけ大きな存在、
「」が徘徊してて、
とても怖くて近づけないヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_004<tab>If you could get rid of it, the rest might leave us alone. Then I can finally harvest Amber weed in peace. So, will you help us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_004とても強そうな旅人さん、報酬は払うから、
「」を倒してほしいネ！
ヤツはガリク村南の崖の上で待ってると現れるはずヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_010<tab>I hate that wandering weapon and its big, stupid face!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_010「」を倒してほしいネ！
ヤツはガリク村南の崖の上で待ってると現れるはずヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_020<tab>You did it? Hooray! Now that Amber weed will be mine! Heh heh heh...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_020「」を倒したネ？
ありがとう、これで「アンバーウィード」を、
採りにいけるネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_021<tab>But I wonder if the other evil weapons will come back... I hear they were made by the mages of Nabaath Areng from enchanted swords. Do not ask me how they ended up looking like that, though!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_021「イビルウェポン」はその昔、
ナバスアレンの魔術師が、
剣に魔法をかけて創り出した使い魔ネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_022<tab>Apparently, their masters disappeared after the Flood. With no one to command them, they have been prowling around Amber, attacking everything that comes close!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_022当時は、魔物から街を守るようしつけられていたけど、
「光の氾濫」で主を失ってからというもの、
いまでは近づく者を手当たり次第に襲う厄介者ヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_023<tab>I hope that by getting rid of the wandering weapon, they will stay away for a while, but who can say? All I know is, I can make my stew now! My stomach thanks you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_023でも、「」さえいなければ、
なんとか隠れて、「アンバーウィード」を採れるネ。
本当に倒してくれて、ありがとネ！
